segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, just waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, like she doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is wobbling under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s risking so much just for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and she has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s face is so full of hope, like she’s sure her brother will succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don’t want to ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so tense—I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies and get down safely before anything bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
